response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we hope this offer will be appealing enough to consider. Should you decide to proceed, we assure you of a seamless transaction and excellent customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
